name: Roku TV Firmware Update
summary: Update.roku is a firmware update file used by a Roku TV. It contains data the TV uses to update to the latest version of the Roku TV software. Update.roku is used to update a Roku TV without connecting it to the Internet.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Transfer to a USB flash drive, then plug the drive into your Roku TV
